name: Abyssal Infants
description:
The game was created in the period of one month for the 4MB game jam.

Everything was created during this period expect.

The music track Less Abyss was partly created for the Eyes of Doom.

The sound effects for Shooting and Player Damage were created for The Eyes of Doom.

https://kakoeimon.itch.io/the-eyes-of-doom-md

The Explosion sound effect is a modified version of:

https://freesound.org/people/qubodup/sounds/145190/

The Thunder sound effect is a modified version of:

https://freesound.org/people/Josh74000MC/sounds/475094/

The sound effects Tiny Death, Boss_Fire and Boss Death are modified versions of:

https://freesound.org/people/Darsycho/sounds/442183/

P.S. The game was not tested on an original platform. (Please inform me if you do.)

Size of the game.

The actual size of the game is 640 KB unzipped and it comes in three versions.

v1 with full BlastEm that surpass the 4MB as it is 7.32MB

v2 with a stripped down version of BlastEm that it is 3.76MB

v3 that is the unzipped rom(.bin) in 640KB

BlastEm is a Sega Genesis / Mega Drive emulator:

https://www.retrodev.com/blastem/

v1 and v2 are only Windows, but you can run the game by using v3 on pretty much any platform with an Sega Genesis / Mega Drive emulator.
